excerpt: ( ** Data Science Certification Using R: https://www.edureka.co/data-science ** ) This Edureka tutorial on "Statistics for Data Science"  talks about the basic concepts of Statistics, which is primarily an applied branch of mathematics, that attempts to make sense of observations in the real world.
